name: io.github.CanopyHQ/phloem
description: Local-first AI memory with causal graphs. Fully offline, zero config, your data stays local.

tools.name: remember
tools.description: Store a memory for later recall

tools.name: forget
tools.description: Delete a specific memory by ID

tools.name: list_memories
tools.description: List recent memories, optionally filtered by tags

tools.name: memory_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about the memory store

tools.name: session_context
tools.description: Load session context with recent memories and key decisions

tools.name: add_citation
tools.description: Add a citation linking a memory to a code location

tools.name: verify_citation
tools.description: Verify if a citation is still valid

tools.name: get_citations
tools.description: Get all citations for a memory

tools.name: verify_memory
tools.description: Verify a memory by checking all its citations

tools.name: causal_query
tools.description: Query causal graph for neighbors or affected memories

tools.name: compose
tools.description: Compose two recall queries with merged results

tools.name: prefetch
tools.description: Get memory suggestions to preload for current context

tools.name: prefetch_suggest
tools.description: Suggest memories to preload given current context
